doc.title: Buxom Girls in Bondage
doc.plot: Bondage vignettes featuring blonde, brunette and raven-tressed damsels. Flaxen-haired beauty Chanta Rose and black-haired roommate Nazia and captured, chloroformed, fondled and then bound and gagged by a man intend on forcing the ladies into white slavery. Brown-haired beach bunny Jasmine Shaye is grabbed while admiring her shapely body in a revealing bikini and is soon roped and silenced by a captor intend on fondling her every feature. In another story, Jasmine's short polka-dot dress draws the undesired attention of an kinky admirer who binds, gags and strips the squealing clerical worker.
